title: RIOT ban this player PLZ!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/FeatG14.jpg begin the game saiyng: <<Enjoy a free win!!!!!>>............
He played Singed top and feeding intentionally an olaf; to make matters worse he ping in team fights and do fake engage just to let our team die.
I want to know how can communicate with Riot about this player.
I know im not the only one that suffers these things but im really pissed off of losing promo like this for intentional feeders!!!!!

_edit by mod: no name & shame_

replies.body:
I've edited your thread because name & shame is not permitted on Riot's forum:

>Reporting Other Players (aka Naming and Shaming)
Please don't report a potentially misbehaving player in these boards. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We’ll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.

>Moderators will be looking for the following:
● Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
● Posts accusing others of malicious activity
● Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
● Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (there’s a report button for that)

---

Qui ti sbagli, per quanto ne so non ci sono controlli sulle chat lobby champ sel e lobby end game in quanto non hanno una propria 'istanza' mentre i game avendo una loro identità, un loro ID possono avere un log della chat quindi in poche parole ciò che è possibile controllare sono solo le chat interne al game oppure quelle private tra 2 persone.

Ma uno che scrive mentre stiamo per iniziare il game in chat a tutti e 2 i teams <<enjoy a free win>> si può vedere?
Possono visionare il replay del game dove si vede quello che fa?
Scusate l'accanimento ma sistematicamente almeno una promo si ed una no mi capita questa gentaglia che si meriterebbe la cancellazione dell'account sul serio!!!!
Lo so che capitano a tutti feeders e trollers e stiamo sulla stessa barca, però quando sono così evidenti la RIOT dovrebbe fare qualcosa!!!
